column4:
['E galiyan ka dharam alag hai', '
Alag hai reet riwaz', '
Na samjhe to samjh lo hamse', '
Ham samjhate aaj', '
Har chhori rani hiya har chhora raja', '
Har chhori rani hiya har chhora raja', '
Magar kabhi baja nahi hiya band baja', '
Magar kabhi baja nahi hiya band baja', '
Har chhori rani hiya har chhora raja', '
Magar kabhi baja nahi hiya band baja', '
Magar kabhi baja nahi hiya band baja', 'Aawara galiyan ki pariya', '
Dekh uthe dil jhum', '
Aawara galiyan ki pariya', '
Dekh uthe dil jhum', '
Idhar pan gajre ki mahak', '
Ghunghru mujre ki dhum', '

Kabhi lachak lachak kar', '
Kabhi chamak chamak kar', '

Kabhi matak matak kar', '

Kabhi matkau matkau', '

Jhatkau jhatkau matak matak', 'Palat tera dhyan kidhar hai bhai', '

Baat baat me baat badhe to', '
Chale tej talwar', '
Are chal gayi lathi badi mar gulathi', '
Are chal gayi lathi badi mar gulathi', '
Sir vayra tamacha kuch', '

Sir vayra tamacha kuch', '

Kabhi tadip tad kabhi', '
Kurukshetar ka lambu', '
Bambu tambu kabhi tadip tad', '
Kabhi kurukshetar ka lambu', '
Bar jori kar na saiya', '

Ari hiya raat bhar ras rachave', '
Dharam ke dhekedar', '
Sach to e hai inke dam se', '
Chale hai e bazar', '
Khabar dar hoshiyar', '
Thanedar hawaldar', '
Paharedar aur jamadar', '
Pakad lo in bandaro ko', 'Are din phar ye jogi re jogi', '
